would-you-rather-the-great-debate.question: Would you rather live without social media OR live without music?
Would you rather have unlimited time OR unlimited money?
Would you rather be respected OR loved?
Would you rather have no one show up to your wedding OR no one show up to your funeral?
Would you rather have your thoughts broadcasted OR your search history leaked?
Would you rather have a rewind button for your life OR a pause button?
Would you rather be able to read minds OR see the future?
Would you rather lose your sense of taste OR your sense of touch?
Would you rather find true love today OR win the lottery next year?
Would you rather be the funniest person in the room OR the smartest person in the room?
Would you rather have everyone agree with you OR never care what anyone thinks?
Would you rather have free travel for life OR free food for life?
Would you rather never take a bad photo again OR never have a bad hair day again?
Would you rather be famous for something embarrassing OR forgotten completely?
Would you rather always have perfect comeback lines OR always make people laugh effortlessly?
Would you rather always know when someone is lying OR always get away with lying?
Would you rather be rich but bored OR poor but fulfilled?
Would you rather be stuck in traffic forever OR have slow Wi-Fi forever?
Would you rather spend a week in the jungle OR a week in the desert?
Would you rather be fluent in every language OR be able to talk to animals?
Would you rather have unlimited knowledge OR unlimited charisma?
Would you rather be able to fly but only as fast as you walk OR run but at lightning speed?
Would you rather always feel slightly too hot OR slightly too cold?
Would you rather spend a year with no internet OR a year with no friends?
Would you rather never get tired OR never get bored?
Would you rather be a genius no one listens to OR an influencer everyone believes?
Would you rather have a photographic memory OR the ability to forget anything you want instantly?
Would you rather only be able to text OR only be able to call people?
Would you rather be known for your looks OR your intelligence?
Would you rather be able to erase one memory OR relive one perfect moment forever?
Would you rather be respected by everyone OR loved by a few?
Would you rather be invisible for one day OR be able to fly for one hour?
Would you rather have the ability to always say the right thing OR never be misunderstood?
Would you rather be able to time travel but never return, OR stay in the present forever?
Would you rather live in a mansion in the middle of nowhere OR a tiny flat in the center of a big city?
Would you rather always be overdressed OR always be underdressed?
Would you rather only be able to whisper OR only be able to shout?
Would you rather give up your phone for a month OR give up showers for a week?
Would you rather always know what to say OR always know what to do?
Would you rather be able to stop time for 10 seconds once a day OR rewind 10 seconds once a day?
Would you rather be allergic to your favorite drink OR your favorite food?
Would you rather have no one remember your birthday OR forget everyone else’s?
Would you rather always be hungry no matter how much you eat OR always be tired no matter how much you sleep?
Would you rather have unlimited data but a terrible phone OR the newest phone but no data?
Would you rather be known for your style OR for your kindness?
Would you rather always feel itchy OR always feel cold?
Would you rather never take another selfie again OR never be in a group photo again?
Would you rather be able to control animals OR control technology with your mind?
Would you rather always be surrounded by people OR always be alone?
Would you rather only be able to eat spicy food OR only bland food forever?
Would you rather be able to run as fast as a cheetah OR swim as fast as a dolphin?
Would you rather never laugh again OR never cry again?
Would you rather have to rhyme every time you speak OR sing everything you say?
Would you rather get stranded on an island with your best friend OR your celebrity crush?
Would you rather spend a week in the future OR a week in the past?
Would you rather have your favorite movie erased from existence OR never be able to watch it again?
Would you rather always have to say exactly what you think OR never be able to speak again?
Would you rather only be able to text using emojis OR only be able to call people?
Would you rather live somewhere that never stops raining OR somewhere that’s always dry?
Would you rather have to tell the truth for a year OR lie about everything for a week?
